nodes.text: The Warlord Heavy Cruiser was a model of gunship used by pirates at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

The Warlord Heavy Cruiser first appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed, the space part of Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, the Warlord Heavy Cruiser had similar size and characteristics than those of the X4 Gunship, the Ye-4 gunship, and the AEG-77 Vigo.
